members.description: These are all available on string objects.

function.name: ToUrlSegment
function.description: Returns a string that can be used as a segment of a URL.

function.name: EnsureStartsWith
function.description: Use this to make sure a string starts with a specific substring or character.

function.name: EnsureEndsWith
function.description: Use this to make sure a string ends with a specific substring or character.

function.name: IsNullOrWhiteSpace
function.description: Indicates whether a specified string is null, empty, or consists only of white-space characters.

function.name: IfNullOrWhiteSpace
function.description: Returns the defaultValue if the string is null, empty or whitespace-only.
